name: Heavy Strike
description:
During this round, your current active character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
When this Normal Attack is a Charged Attack: Deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: During this round, your current active character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a $[K51]:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: During this round, your current active character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.
storytext:
For those that aren't so strong...
It's best to regard the "The Shatterstone Method" as just a "metaphor."
